name: Academic institutions with science and engineering research space shared with other fields or used for purposes other than research, by type of institution: FY 2023
description: Academic institutions with science and engineering research space shared with other fields or used for purposes other than research, by type of institution: FY 2023

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_institutions_with_research_space_number_a
variableMeasured.description: Institutions With Research Space Number A

variableMeasured.name: field_institutions_with_research_space_shared_with_other_fields_number
variableMeasured.description: Institutions With Research Space Shared With Other Fields Number

variableMeasured.name: field_institutions_with_research_space_shared_with_other_fields_percent
variableMeasured.description: Institutions With Research Space Shared With Other Fields Percent

variableMeasured.name: field_institutions_with_research_space_also_used_for_nonresearch_purposes_number
variableMeasured.description: Institutions With Research Space Also Used For Nonresearch Purposes Number

variableMeasured.name: field_institutions_with_research_space_also_used_for_nonresearch_purposes_percent
variableMeasured.description: Institutions With Research Space Also Used For Nonresearch Purposes Percent

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Institutions were asked to indicate whether any of the net assignable square feet of research space reported in individual field totals was shared with other fields or used for purposes other than research.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Science and Engineering Research Facilities, FY 2023.
